skin-hair.title: REFRESH+ Dry Shampoo
skin-hair.description: Lightweight dry shampoo balances the scalp and absorbs excess oil, sweat + odor for revived, refreshed hair between washes
skin-hair.details: What it is: A nightly eyelash conditioning serum infused with technology to enhance the appearance of length, volume + definition of eyelashes and eyebrows. Why you need it: Lash durability can be enhanced with proper moisture and protection against breakage. Condition your eyebrows and eyelashes to achieve youthful, fuller-looking definition. *Source Euromonitor International Limited; Beauty and Personal Care 2022 Edition, retail value RSP terms; all channels; Lash Serum including Lash Serum products sold as part of Sets and Kits.

skin-hair.title: Total RF Serum
skin-hair.description: Our most comprehensive anti-aging serum features RF TriEnergy Complex that energizes millions of surface skin cells by 200% to address all key signs of skin aging.
skin-hair.details: A powerful anti-aging serum that revitalizes skin to help you see stronger, healthier, more resilient skin. Achieve visible results when using this serum on its own and even better results with a Regimen

skin-hair.title: R + F Lash Boost
skin-hair.description: #1 Premium Lash Serum in the U.S. in 2021!* Our famous lash conditioning serum is applied nightly to promote the appearance of longer, stronger and darker-looking lashes (or brows!)
skin-hair.details: What it is: A nightly eyelash conditioning serum infused with technology to enhance the appearance of length, volume + definition of eyelashes and eyebrows.

skin-hair.title: REDEFINE Multi-Function Eye Cream
skin-hair.description: Younger-looking eyes in a wink! Our intensive anti-aging eye cream visibly firms + lifts to improve the look of fine lines, wrinkles, sagging + crow’s feet.
skin-hair.details: What it is: The ultimate eye cream for visibly reducing key signs of aging. Supports the skin barrier around the eye with Vitamins C+F, Grape + Daisy Botanical Extracts + Antioxidants.

skin-hair.title: R + F Active Hydration Serum
skin-hair.description: Quench thirsty skin. Instantly boosts hydration levels by 200% + locks in moisture on the surface of the skin. Add to any Regimen for even better results.
skin-hair.details: What it is: A super-hydrating face serum that balances moisture levels and preps skin to better receive products applied after.

skin-hair.title: REDEFINE Intensive Renewing Serum
skin-hair.description: Wake up to vibrant skin! Plump fine lines + visibly lift sagging skin with the most potent form of Vitamin A you can get without a prescription.
skin-hair.details: What it is: A revitalizing face serum that reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and loss of firmness for more refined, smoother skin.

skin-hair.title: Active Hydration Bright Eye Complex
skin-hair.description: Wake up to younger-looking eyes. Our illuminating gel cream reduces visible dark circles + under-eye puffiness over time.
skin-hair.details: What it is: Brightening, hydrating eye cream that targets signs of stress and fatigue by soothing skin around the eyes. For optimal results, use daily, morning and night.

skin-hair.title: R+F Instant Targeted Firming Gel™
skin-hair.description: nstantly firm, tighten + smooth for a youthful look in just 5 minutes*, plus further reduce visible signs of aging in targeted area in just 4 weeks!
skin-hair.details: What it is: A clinically tested, multi-targeted skincare treatment that instantly* and visibly firms, tightens + smooths wrinkles, crow’s feet, sagging skin, under eye bags and expression lines. Overtime with continued use, targeted area will appear tighter with visibly fewer fine lines. Eco-friendly because it’s refillable! Keep the outer casing and cap for your refill.

skin-hair.title: Rodan + Fields Active Hydration Body Replenish
skin-hair.description: All-over hydration. Get younger-looking, younger-acting skin with our breakthrough body moisturizer that instantly + continuously hydrates.
skin-hair.details: What it is: An ultra-hydrating body moisturizer cream that promotes noticeably softer, smoother and more nourished skin.

skin-hair.title: Rodan + Fields Enhancements Micro-Dermabrasion Paste
skin-hair.description: Meet our best selling scrub. Gentle face + body scrub exfoliates away dead skin cells for smoother, brighter, more vibrant-looking skin after just one use.
skin-hair.details: What it is: A sugar and salt-based scrub for both face and body that gently buffs away dull skin cells and dry, flaky skin.

data.title: Black
data.description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served warm. And if you want to sound fancy, you can call black coffee by its proper name: cafe noir.

data.title: Latte
data.description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, the latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or with a flavor shot of anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

data.title: Cappuccino
data.description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that throw in flavor shot, as well.

data.title: Americano
data.description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, the americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.

data.title: Espresso
data.description: An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.

data.title: Doppio
data.description: A double shot of espresso, the doppio is perfect for putting extra pep in your step.

data.title: Cortado
data.description: Like yin and yang, a cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk. The milk is used to cut back on the espresso’s acidity.

data.title: Red Eye
data.description: Named after those pesky midnight flights, a red eye can cure any tiresome morning. A full cup of hot coffee with an espresso shot mixed in, this will definitely get your heart racing.

data.title: Galão
data.description: Originating in Portugal, this hot coffee drink is closely related to the latte and cappuccino. Only difference is it contains about twice as much foamed milk, making it a lighter drink compared to the other two.

data.title: Lungo
data.description: A lungo is a long-pull espresso. The longer the pull, the more caffeine there is and the more ounces you can enjoy.

data.title: Macchiato
data.description: The macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It’s the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.

data.title: Mocha
data.description: For all you chocolate lovers out there, you’ll fall in love with a mocha (or maybe you already have). The mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

data.title: Ristretto
data.description: Ristretto is an espresso shot. It uses less hot water which creates a sweeter flavor compared to the bitter taste of a traditional shot of espresso or a doppio.

data.title: Flat White
data.description: This Aussie-born drink is basically a cappuccino without the foam or chocolate sprinkle. It’s an espresso drink with steamed milk.

data.title: Affogato
data.description: The affogato is an excuse to enjoy a scoop of ice cream any time of day (and any time of year in my opinion). Served with a scoop of ice cream and a shot of espresso, or two.

data.title: Café au Lait
data.description: Café au lait is perfect for the coffee minimalist who wants a bit more flavor. Just add a splash of warm milk to your coffee and you’re all set!

data.title: Irish
data.description: Irish coffee consists of black coffee, whiskey and sugar, topped with whipped cream.

data.title: Guayoyo
data.description: Traditional venezuelan coffee prepared by filtering the ground coffee in a cone of cloth and pouring hot water on top of it. It's prefferably drinked wihout milk nor cream.

data.title: Cortadito
data.description: Traditional cuban coffee method where a bit of freshly brewed coffee is mixed with sugar to create a highly sugared paste. Then add the rest of the coffee and stir adding milk until a 50/50 ratio is achieved.

data.title: Aguapanela Coffee
data.description: Bring panela and coffee to a boil in a small pan for 30 minutes until panela is melted. Brew your coffee using your favorite brewing technique but add the hot aguapanela instead of hot water. Delicious sweetened coffee is ready.
